name: Air Combat 1945
description:
Air Combat 1945 is a retro Arcade style shooter game, It uses classic World War II realistic style, highly restored World War II battlefield, World War II fans will love this flying shooting game! The game has a perfect operating feel. Thousands of gorgeous barrage on the battlefield, make you have a pleasant experience in aircraft!
Game features:
- 16 exciting missions
- Various opponents
- Strong bosses
- Handy system of controls
- Retro style graphics
